entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Buffalo Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 p.m. CST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: n/a
entry.summary:
Observed at: Buffalo Narrows Airport 4:00 PM CST Sunday 7 May 2023
Visibility: 16 km
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Local smoke. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 7 May 2023
